amendatorysection.para: Out-of-hospital emergency care provider includes all licensure classifications of emergency care providers established pursuant to the Emergency Medical Services Practice Act. Prior to December 31, 2025, out-of-hospital emergency care provider includes out-of-hospital advanced emergency medical technician, emergency medical responder, emergency medical technician, emergency medical technician-intermediate, and paramedic. On and after December 31, 2025, out-of-hospital emergency care provider includes advanced emergency medical technician, emergency medical responder, emergency medical technician, and paramedic.
